short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bringing awesome colors and fonts to the new tab page! A little bit of something fresh every time you hit that new tab button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Palettab is a chrome extension to help you discover new fonts and awesome color collections every time you hit the new tab button.
